casebody.data:
IN RE: ENTZMINGER 317P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 15, 2019 David R. Johnson, Deputy Counsel, for NC State Bar. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Entzminger, Phillip. Katherine Jean, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC State Bar. Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of August 2019 by Respondent for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of August 2019."
